org.jcsp.awt
Interface ActiveContainer.Configure

Enclosing class:
ActiveContainer
public static interface ActiveContainer.Configure

This enables general configuration of this component. Any object implementing this interface and sent down the configure channel to this component will have its configure method invoked on this component.

For an example, see ActiveApplet.Configure.

Method Summary
 void configure(Container container)
           
 

Method Detail

configure

void configure(Container container)
Parameters:
container - the Container being configured.
